name: Ways
description:
WAYS is a platform game with exciting features. There are huge number of enemies and they are powerful as well. You need a strong force to destroy the enemies. BOSS is stronger than you. Though the war is tough but you should not give up. Destroy the enemies with a powerful gun provided to you. Show your skills to the world.

  • 8 Locations and Environments.
  • 1 Major Weapon with continuous firing mode.
  • Breakable walls and robots.
  • 2 Types of BOSS!
  • A wide range of Equipments and Health Bags.
  • Many Ammo Packs.
  • Various Types of Enemies.
  • And Much More!

Game Requirements:

RAM : 1 GB or higher

Video Memory: 128 MB Minimum

NOTE: All future updates FREE!

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have any problem. I will reply to you as soon as possible.

contact me through my website:

ENJOY!
